title: Fortune Cookie
description: A golden-brown, crescent-shaped, vanilla-flavored fortune cookie. Usually depicted with a strip of paper—on which a wise saying, lucky numbers, or Chinese vocabulary is written—peaking out of its hollow shell. Given at the end of meals at Chinese restaurants in the West.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the fortune cookie emoji is presented with a delightful, crisp texture and a warm, golden-brown hue, thanks to Apple's realistic lighting and smooth gradients. The slightly curved shape and subtle shadows give it a palpable sense of depth, inviting curiosity about the wisdom within. This emoji is commonly used to symbolize good luck, unexpected insights, or the anticipation of pleasant surprises, adding a touch of playful mystery to communications on Apple devices.
